programme.title: Secret Societies: In The Shadows

programme.title: New: Empire Builders

programme.title: New: Empire Builders

programme.title: Alien Files Reopened

programme.title: The Sumatran Monster

programme.title: UFO Town

programme.title: Weird Or What? With William Shatner

programme.title: Weird Or What?...

programme.title: Schitt's Creek

programme.title: Schitt's Creek

programme.title: Schitt's Creek

programme.title: Schitt's Creek

programme.desc: The National Crime Agency take on a people-trafficking group while Surrey and City of London Police hunt down exploitative romance fraudsters.

programme.desc: White Whale: Diaz and Santiago team up to take down a ruthless killer who has eluded them for seven years. Jeffords helps Peralta with wedding chores.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Jake & Amy: The precinct squad rush to save Peralta and Santiago's wedding day from a major threat. Captain Holt receives an email containing important news, but won't open it.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Alone Again Natura-Diddily: When tragedy strikes Maude Flanders at Springfield's new race track, the Simpsons must help a bereft Ned.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Missionary: Impossible: Homer pledges $10,000 to save his favourite British sitcom, Do Shut Up. But when the channel comes for the cash, he flees to a South Pacific island.

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: The final newly-weds embark on their honeymoons! Meanwhile, a badly behaved husband receives a warning, and will physical intimacy lead to a deeper connection?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Dependence Transcendence: Tensions rise when the guys struggle to complete their Air Force project on time and are forced to work around the clock.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Cohabitation Experimentation: When Amy's flat is flooded, she has to move out while it is being repaired and proposes a 'cohabitation experiment' with Sheldon.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Milhouse of Sand and Fog: Milhouse is annoyed when his parents get back together. Homer catches chicken pox.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Treehouse of Horror XVI: Bart falls into a coma and is replaced by a well-behaved robot. Homer takes part in a deadly TV game show. And Lisa turns into Albert Einstein.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Tony and Diane are consumed by wedding planning, but Tony is distracted by having to pacify a demanding Marie. And could anything be more awkward than a lunch with Darren and Nancy?

programme.title: Hollyoaks at 30: Most Explosive...
programme.desc: ...Episodes: A look back at a classic episode ahead of Hollyoaks' 30th anniversary. With her crimes exposed, the hunt is on for Nico. Will Sienna help to catch her deadly daughter?

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: A pony groom who likes getting muddy meets a country boy with a 'bit of an edge'. And a 70-year-old joker has a date with a dance-loving 69-year-old who's into grinding.

programme.title: New: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: At the third dinner party, confessions are served with a side dish of jealousy, as one bride comes clean and a new bride's arrival and antics stir the group.

programme.title: New: Made in Chelsea
programme.desc: Brand new series: Jazz is caught between Demi and Jules. Livvy cools things off with Kit... before Chuggs swoops in! And will Tabitha obey Sophie's orders not to see Arman again?!

programme.title: News
programme.desc: The leading news stories of the moment.

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: (2006) Pulsating sci-fi action with Denzel Washington and Val Kilmer. An AFT agent uses new technology to reach back in time, stop a ferry bombing, and save the love of his life. Simple.

programme.title: Man on Fire
programme.desc: (2004) Revenge thriller with Denzel Washington. An ex-CIA agent who's trying to start a new life in Mexico seeks brutal retribution when the girl who he's been hired to guard is kidnapped.

programme.title: Hush
programme.desc: (2008) Thriller with William Ash and Christine Bottomley. A man is drawn into a deadly and gory cat-and-mouse game of survival when his girlfriend is abducted by a mysterious truck driver.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Dragonball Evolution
programme.desc: (2009) Martial arts adventure. Justin Chatwin stars as the leader of a mystical band of warriors who are out to save the world from the ancient demon Lord Piccolo. With James Marsters.

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: (1994) Comedy starring Joe Mantegna, Joe Pantoliano and Brian Haley. Inept criminals kidnap a millionaire's baby. But when the boy escapes, there's mayhem as they try to track him down.

programme.title: The Seeker: The Dark Is Rising
programme.desc: (2007) Supernatural thriller. Alexander Ludwig stars as The Seeker, who has the task of finding six items hidden throughout time, which the scary forces of The Dark are also looking for.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
programme.desc: (2018) Oscar-winning animated superhero adventure with the voices of Shameik Moore, Kathryn Hahn and Nicolas Cage. Can a gang of Spider-heroes save the universe from reality-bending chaos?

programme.title: Gemini Man
programme.desc: (2019) Will Smith stars in Ang Lee's action-thriller as both an over-the-hill hitman and the young clone of himself sent to take him out. With Clive Owen.
(2023) Sci-fi action adventure starring Adam Driver as a spaceman who crash-lands on a strange planet where giant lizards stalk the darkness... 65 million years ago. Where on Earth is he?

programme.title: The Black Phone
programme.desc: (2021) Horror with Ethan Hawke. Denver 1974 and The Grabber is snatching boys from the street. But he doesn't reckon on two kids with uncanny abilities who refuse to do as they're told.

programme.title: The Lovely Bones
programme.desc: (2009) Saoirse Ronan stars in Peter Jackson's fantasy drama. The spirit of a raped and brutally murdered girl watches over her distraught family as her killer prepares his next attack.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Barnacle Bill
programme.desc: (1957) The final Ealing comedy stars Alec Guinness as the latest in a long and distinguished line of sailors, but there's a problem: he suffers from seasickness. So why not buy a pier?

programme.title: The Borrowers
programme.desc: (1997) Family fantasy comedy-adventure starring Jim Broadbent and Celia Imrie. A family of miniscule people live beneath the floorboards of a regular-sized family's house.

programme.title: Tooth Fairy
programme.desc: (2010) Family fantasy comedy. Dwayne Johnson stars as a tough ice hockey player who is transformed into a real-life fairy as punishment for telling a child that tooth fairies don't exist.

programme.title: Bridge of Spies Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Steven Spielberg and stars Tom Hanks and Mark Rylance talk about making their Cold War espionage drama.

programme.title: Turner & Hooch
programme.desc: (1989) Comedy-thriller starring Tom Hanks. A cop investigates a murder to which there's just one witness: Hooch, a slobbering, beer-drinking French mastiff, who now needs 24/7 protection.

programme.title: Bumblebee
programme.desc: (2018) High-octane sci-fi action adventure starring Hailee Steinfeld. When Charlie drives home a clapped-out VW Beetle, she gets more than she bargained for: a huge robotic alien.

programme.title: Top Gun: Maverick
programme.desc: (2022) Danger-zone action as Tom Cruise returns to the cockpit after 36 years. He's Maverick. He still feels the need for speed. And there's a near-impossible mission to fly. With Jon Hamm.

programme.title: Infinite
programme.desc: (2021) Sci-fi action. Mark Wahlberg discovers that his hallucinations are memories from past lives. There are others like him, but they don't all have good intentions...

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: Next of Kin
programme.desc: (2021) Found-footage supernatural horror. A young woman visits an Amish community to make a documentary about her family. But there's a good reason why her mum got her away from there...

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: LumoTV: Sign2Win
programme.desc: Do siblings Marie and Barry; best friends June and Sylvia, and childhood friends Leo and James have enough BSL knowledge to win £1,000?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The 300 Spartans
programme.desc: (1962) Historical drama with Ralph Richardson. A retelling of the stand made at Thermopylae in 480 BC by a small Greek force against invasion by an enormous Persian army.

programme.title: Henry VIII and His Six Wives
programme.desc: (1972) Historical drama with Keith Michell as Henry VIII, nobly supported by Donald Pleasance, Charlotte Rampling and Jane Asher. The dying monarch reviews his own life.

programme.title: Ride Lonesome
programme.desc: (1959) Western. Randolph Scott plays a bounty hunter who has unfinished business with the brother of his latest target. But his quest for revenge looks like it could be undermined.

programme.title: Kind Hearts and Coronets
programme.desc: (1949) This dark comedy from Ealing studios sees Alec Guinness take on the roles of eight characters, all the noble victims of a vengeance-seeking relative, played by Dennis Price.

programme.title: Land
programme.desc: (2021) Wilderness drama with Robyn Wright. After experiencing a personal tragedy, a woman moves to the Rockies in search of isolation. But can she survive there?

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: (2017) Fantasy adventure starring Matt Damon and Willem Dafoe. In 11th-century China, Europeans seeking the secret of gunpowder are caught up in a war against alien monsters.

programme.title: The Forever Purge
programme.desc: (2021) Dystopian crime thriller sequel. The NFFA are back. The Purge is back. Racists feel empowered. And when migrants start to go missing in Texas, it seems like the Purge will never end.

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: (2006) Pulsating sci-fi action with Denzel Washington and Val Kilmer. An AFT agent uses new technology to reach back in time, stop a ferry bombing, and save the love of his life. Simple.

programme.desc: Join Patrick for two hours of spirited debate and news making interviews. Top guests tackle the issues that matter, with a sharp take on every story.

programme.desc: Tomorrow's news, tonight. All the major stories making the front pages and full coverage of all the breaking news at home and abroad with Patrick Christys.

programme.title: The Late Show Live

programme.desc: Lee Anderson brings the Real World to the Great British public, as the silent majority finally have their voices heard.
